content: The other day I was clicking around in Pantheon and turned on Solr. That led me to the API module for Backdrop which says that I need to have the Apache Solr module configured. I can't seem to find any mentions of that anywhere else. Am I trying to do something that won't work?
I don't know if anyone has fully ported the Solr module or Search API yet
That's what I thought I was finding and wanted to make sure.
